subject: Sleep
title: Sleep Apps Can Diagnose Sleep Disorders
description: A 60-second lesson on Sleep Apps Can Diagnose Sleep Disorders.

hook.text: An app says you might have sleep apnea based on your snoring recordings. Should you trust it?

buildup.text: Sleep apps can record sounds, track movement, and estimate sleep stages using phone sensors.

discovery.text: Some snoring apps show promise as screening tools but none are FDA-approved for diagnosis.

twist.text: False positives create unnecessary anxiety. False negatives create dangerous false reassurance for serious conditions.

climax.text: Sleep disorders require clinical evaluation with polysomnography. No app can replace a sleep study.

punchline.text: Apps can flag concerns. Only doctors can diagnose them.

quiz.question: Can sleep apps accurately diagnose sleep disorders?
options: Yes, they are as accurate as lab tests
No, they may screen for issues but cannot replace clinical sleep studies
Only the most expensive apps can diagnose
